TopicTitle: Rings on Saturn, Neptune, & Opaque Atmospheres for Venus/Titan

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm brand new to these forums, and relatively new to KSP. I've played vanilla KSP for a little bit now, but I'm more interested in converting it over to a realistic solar system.

I'm not sure if this has been addressed already. I've done searches, but have only found vague, passing references to PlanetFactory (which I'm not even sure works with the latest KSP update).

Basically, I've downloaded Real Solar System, and have three main questions:

1.) Is it possible to add rings to Saturn (and Uranus)?

2.) Is it possible to add Neptune, or at least replace Pluto with Neptune (proper orbit, and all)?

3.) Is it possible to add opaque atmospheres to Venus and Titan? (currently you can see the surface from space, which of course isn't accurate)

I greatly appreciate the help! I have other questions, but I think I'll save those for later.
All of those things are possible! Try Environmental Visual Enhancements or Kitopia Tech, or both! By the way, welcome to the forums!
Don't forget 'Better Atmospheres' which does all those things with the help of EVE and other mods.
Uhhhh..... It uses EVE and Kittopia tech..... I'm not forgetting it...
